title: [DREAMER] Implement production transcription service for live streaming
overview:
Live audio streams are transcribed with placeholder text like '[Audio chunk N]' when the transcription service fails. This makes the live stream feature unusable for production use cases where real transcription is required.

**Motivation:** Real-time transcription is a key feature for live stream processing. Without working transcription, the system cannot extract text from audio streams for analysis, search, or indexing.

**Success criteria:**
- Transcription service integration (OpenAI Whisper or similar)
- Graceful fallback when service unavailable
- Transcription quality metrics
- Cost tracking for transcription API
- Language detection support

**Technical constraints:**
- Must handle real-time audio chunks
- Transcription latency must be low
- API cost management required
- Should support multiple languages
- Error handling for audio quality issues

**In scope:**
- Integrate real transcription service (Whisper API)
- Implement proper error handling
- Add transcription cost tracking
- Support multiple audio formats
- Write tests with real audio
**Out of scope:**
- Audio processing pipeline (already exists)
- Stream relay infrastructure (already exists)
- Custom transcription model (use API)

**Signals:** priority: medium, urgency: Live stream feature incomplete
